ActCanadian Environmental Protection Act, 1999
PrecisTETRACHLOROETHYLENE (USE IN DRY CLEANING AND REPORTING REQUIREMENTS) REGULATIONS which are designed to reduce the amount of tetrachloroethylene (commonly called PERC) released into the environment by dry-cleaning operations.
